Topic.Title: How to execute an object's description script from code.

Posts.EditableText: if I put "msg(look.object)" it just messages the scripts code without executing it.
Posts.HTML: if I put "msg(look.object)" it just messages the scripts code without executing it.

Posts.EditableText:
If it's a text description, you would do:
```
msg (object.look)
```
If it's a script, you would do:
```
do (object, "look")
```

If you're not sure which it is because your script can be used on different objects, you would do what the "look at" command itself does:
```
if (HasString (object, "look")) {
  msg (object.look)
}
else if (HasScript (object, "look")) {
  do (object, "look")
}
```
